aboutme.title: About Me

langGerman.title: German
langGerman.description: German is my mother tongue. It has accompanied me throughout my life since birth and is an integral part of my everyday life.

langItalian.title: Italian
langItalian.description: I have been speaking Italian since birth. This language is my mother tongue, learned from my parents.

langEnglish.title: English
langEnglish.description: Although I have been speaking English since the third grade, I would like to master it better. While it is a solid part of my everyday life, I am working on deepening my skills.

langFrench.title: French
langFrench.description: I have been speaking French since the fourth grade, which is about five years now. I learned the language in school.

aboutme.cardCampingDescription: In the midst of nature, under the starry sky.
aboutme.cardSportsDescription: Intense sports, team spirit, and pure adrenaline.
aboutme.cardFishingDescription: Peace by the water when the fish are biting.

projects.title: Visited Projects
projects.onboardingProject: During a three-month onboarding program, you will acquire important skills for working on various projects in different teams at Swisscom.
projects.datalakeProject: Get to know big data platforms (Hadoop, Kubernetes) and deploy container images. Apply your knowledge by enhancing Spark images and automating CI/CD.
projects.nexCCProject: NexCC, the competence center within NEX, develops and maintains key applications for the entire company and provides comprehensive software and hardware support.
projects.appsTeamProject: We are a young team passionate about designing and developing high-quality web applications.

question1.question: How was your first day as an apprentice?
question1.answer: My first day as an apprentice was exciting and somewhat overwhelming, but I was also curious and ready to learn everything that came my way.

question2.question: What inspired you to choose this apprenticeship?
question2.answer: The prospect of learning practical skills and making a direct contribution to an area that has always interested me inspired me to choose this apprenticeship.

question3.question: How have you evolved during the apprenticeship?
question3.answer: During my apprenticeship, I greatly improved my skills in teamwork and problem-solving, which helped me become more professionally confident.

question4.question: What advice would you give to others starting a similar apprenticeship?
question4.answer: My advice to others starting a similar apprenticeship would be to be open to new experiences and actively seek opportunities for personal and professional growth.
